fields.label: Stripeset: Page Lede Assets
fields.name: lede_stripeset
fields.instructions: The primary text and story elements that can be organized and formatted with one or more Stripes to add a pull quote, single photo, photo gallery, video or embeddable interactive.

sub_fields.label: Stripe: Story Text
sub_fields.name: text_field
sub_fields.instructions: To create a single line break use SHIFT+RETURN. By default, RETURN creates a new paragraph.

sub_fields.label: Caption

sub_fields.label: Video Player
sub_fields.name: video_player
sub_fields.instructions: Upload your video to WordPress (it will be slower than youtube) File Size is limited to 256MB.

sub_fields.label: Photo Gallery
sub_fields.name: gallery
sub_fields.instructions:
Upload or select photos from the Media Library to create a gallery specific to this post. Complete the Title, Caption and Alt Text fields of every photo. Captions that display within a gallery are based on the Caption fields and MUST include this credit line: Photo by Photographer Name.

Note: Be aware that any photos that appear in multiple galleries will share the same Caption. Please edit accordingly.
